p: Using a combination of search terms, including “Hand foot and mouth disease,” “Hand foot and mouth,” “HFMD,” “Enterovirus,” “Enterovirus 71,” “EV-A71,” “Coxsackie A16,” “CV-A16,” “CVA16,” we searched PubMed, Thomson Reuters Web of Science and Google Scholar to identify 1305, 1255 and 100 articles, respectively.
